Title: [center]Electrical Road Barrier[/center]
Description: [fill]There are various electrical road barriers installed to prevent access to vehicles. As an introduction example we use a simple [b]barrier with a motor[/b] to lift or lower the barrier and a [b]sensor when the opened or closed position are reached[/b]. A Guard in the right green building next to the barrier signals when the road should be blocked or passable.[/fill]
Goal: [fill]Create a sequential function chart to let vehicles pass the checkpoint according to the guards signal.[/fill]
